## isNull() function

Checks if the given value is `null`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
isNull: <T>(input: T) => input is T & null
```

## Example

```ts
isNull(1); // false
isNull("1"); // false
isNull(undefined); // false
isNull(null); // true
```

[Open Source Code](https://github.com/marpple/FxTS/blob/main/src/isNull.ts)
